resources.string: This Application is Useful for controlling the use of mobile/internet by the Kids. Parents can set the wifi OFF-ON time by pressing alarm icon and password. Wifi will be turned -off automatically by predefined time again turn On again .\n Ideal time should be late night to turn-off and Morning is to turn-on. In during OFF- ON time, some one try to Enable Wifi ON from any other way also restricted like from setting or with any other app. \n Safe internet browsing :-)
Please provide the feedback on \n sree.tech2016@gmail.com
